Then she returned and kept flirting with him teasingly without making herself clear that she did want him back in her life while he still loved her and was trying to get over her, and finally his last strand of reason broke and he fucked her, then just kept fucking her, throwing all caution or care to the wind. This is a much more realistic scenario than your usual netorare, where they get some minor blackmail from someone, usually nothing serious, and immediately go to, "welp, better fuck him, then!" and then completely fall for the blackmailer, often within the first few seconds or minutes. We really need to separate netorare, netori, and cheating properly. Some people are confused as to which tag is going to be used. In this case, the point of view is with the MC (boy), so it's only right for the tags to follow his story. Like, if he's being cucked then its netorare, if he's the one stealing then its netori, and if he's only cheating then its cheating. It is more complicated but it does solve arguments that stems from this divide.
